data.actual_result: The toggle switch button shoots outside of the box each time you click it.
data.expected_result: The toggle switch will stay within the box it's assigned to.
data.short_description: Toggling the "display running game as a status message", displays the button out of the box each time.
data.steps_to_repro: - Head over to settings and open 'Games' - Toggle the "display running game as a status message" and watch the on/off button switch - compare results
